    public class GameTable
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Models a game table.
    Author:
    Lance Alcabasa and Ryan Dimaunahan

      • getCurrentSelectedCard

        public Card getCurrentSelectedCard()
        Gets the currently selected card. This is the card that is currently being blown up in the Blow Up card label.
        Returns:
        the currently selected card.

      • setCurrentSelectedCard

        public void setCurrentSelectedCard(Card currentSelectedCard)
        Sets the currently selected card, which is the card that is currently being blown up. Note that this will NOT automatically change the image of the blown up card. That is handled by the BlowUpClickAction. In fact, the only class that should use this method is the BlowUpClickAction class. Do not call this method unless you are absolutely certain you need to do so.
        Parameters:
        currentSelectedCard - the new currently selected card. This is the card you set to the Blow Up card.
        See Also:
        BlowUpClickAction

      • getPlayer1SpendingLimit

        public javax.swing.JLabel getPlayer1SpendingLimit()
